name: Palace
uniques: Indicates the capital city

name: Lighthouse
uniques: Can only be built in coastal cities
[+1 Food] from [Water] tiles in this city

name: Harbor
uniques: [+1 Production] from [Water resource] tiles in this city
Connects trade routes over water
Must be next to [Coast]

name: The Great Lighthouse
uniques: Must be next to [Coast]
All military naval units receive +1 movement and +1 sight
quote: 'They that go down to the sea in ships, that do business in great waters; these see the works of the Lord, and his wonders in the deep.' - The Bible, Psalms 107:23-24

name: Seaport
uniques: Requires a [Harbor] in this city
[+1 Production, +1 Gold] from [Water resource] tiles in this city
Must be next to [Coast]
+[15]% production when building [naval units] in this city

name: Library
uniques: [+1 Science] Per [2] Population in this city

name: National College
uniques: Requires a [Library] in all cities
Cost increases by [30] per owned city

name: National Treasury
uniques: Requires a [Market] in all cities
Cost increases by [30] per owned city

name: Big Ben
uniques: Cost of purchasing items in cities reduced by [15]%
quote: 'To achieve great things, two things are needed: a plan, and not quite enough time.'  - Leonard Bernstein

name: Aqueduct
uniques: [40]% of food is carried over after population increases

name: Great Wall
uniques: Enemy land units must spend 1 extra movement point when inside your territory
quote: 'The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's not attacking, but rather on the fact that we have made our position unassailable.'  - Sun Tzu

name: Statue of Liberty
uniques: [+1 Production] from every specialist
quote: 'Give me your tired, your poor, your huddled masses yearning to breathe free, the wretched refuse of your teeming shore. Send these, the homeless, tempest-tossed to me, I lift my lamp beside the golden door!'  - Emma Lazarus

name: Sydney Opera House
uniques: Free Social Policy
Must be next to [Coast]
quote: 'Those who lose dreaming are lost.'  - Australian Aboriginal saying

name: National Epic
uniques: Requires a [Monument] in all cities
+[25]% great person generation in this city
Cost increases by [30] per owned city

name: Temple
uniques: Requires a [Monument] in this city

name: Forge
uniques: +[5]% production when building [land units] in this city
Provides [2] Iron

name: Windmill
uniques: Must not be on [Hill]
+[5]% production when building [Buildings] in this city
